typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTProduct
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DemoProduct
SalesLTProduct derive(CreatedHash = sha1(Name + ProductNumber + Color)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, DemoProduct exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsHashKey
ExistsHashKey, DemoProduct lookup(SalesLTProduct@ProductID == DemoProduct@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProductID
LookupProductID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumnFromLookup
DerivedColumnFromLookup alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SalesLTProduct@ProductID,
		Name = SalesLTProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber = SalesLTProduct@ProductNumber,
		Color = SalesLTProduct@Color,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimProductSink

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DemoDimCustomer
SalesLTCustomer derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName + LastName + CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumnFromSalesLTCustomer
DerivedColumnFromSalesLTCustomer, DemoDimCustomer exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsHashKey
ExistsHashKey, DemoDimCustomer lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DemoDimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustomerID
LookupCustomerID derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumnFromLookup
DerivedColumnFromLookup alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimCustomerSink
